mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_method (user_id, payment_method, card_number, expiration_date, card_holder_name) VALUES (#{user_id},#{payment_method},#{card_number},#{expiration_date},#{card_holder_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE payment_method SET payment_method = #{payment_method}, card_number = #{card_number}, expiration_date = #{expiration_date}, card_holder_name = #{card_holder_name} WHERE payment_no = #{payment_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shipping_address (user_id, postal_code, address1, address2, phone_number, shipping_address_name) VALUES (#{user_id},#{postal_code},#{address1},#{address2},#{phone_number},#{shipping_address_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE shipping_address SET postal_code = #{postal_code}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, phone_number = #{phone_number}, shipping_address_name = #{shipping_address_name} WHERE shipping_address_no = #{shipping_address_no}

UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, postal_code = #{postal_code}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, phone_number = #{phone_number}, email = #{email}, birthday = #{birthday} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
